code: import React from'react';import{ChartBarIcon,GlobeAltIcon,ClockIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchStats=_ref=>{let{stats={totalSearches:1234567,activeUsers:89012,averageResponseTime:0.15}}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8 p-6 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4",children:"Search Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartBarIcon,{className:"h-8 w-8 text-blue-500 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white",children:stats.totalSearches.toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400",children:"Total Searches"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GlobeAltIcon,{className:"h-8 w-8 text-green-500 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white",children:stats.activeUsers.toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400",children:"Active Users"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClockIcon,{className:"h-8 w-8 text-purple-500 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white",children:[stats.averageResponseTime,"s"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400",children:"Avg Response Time"})]})]})]})]});};export default SearchStats;
